name: He Pull Up (Beta)
description:
After discovering the secret war crimes of capybaras, you have been trapped deep in a convoluted maze. In order to escape, you must traverse the maze, find a key, and then find the exit. Throughout the maze there are watermelons scattered about, which may save you if you find yourself cornered by the capybara that are hunting you down. I wish you luck...

Controls:

- Movement: WASD

- Flashlight: F

- Sprint: Shift

- Pause: Esc

Note: The game is currently in a beta version, so not everything that I want to implement has fully been implemented yet. Things may also not be properly balanced at this point in development, so keep that in mind when trying it out.
